EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Account is 15 Days Past Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
Your BlueWave account is 15 days past due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance__c}.
Please make a payment as soon as possible so your account does not incur late fees.
To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please log into your BlueWave Portal. You can also access your portal at bluewavesolar.com.
Per your community solar agreement, BlueWave reserves the right to cancel your agreement at any point after your account becomes ten days past due.
Log Into Your Portal Here
- All of us here at BlueWave
